verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> that came to Micah <WH4318> the Morashtite <WH4183> in the days <WH3117> of Jotham <WH3147>, Ahaz <WH271>, and Hezekiah <WH3169>, kings <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, which he saw <WH2372> concerning Samaria <WH8111> and Jerusalem <WH3389>.
